cards.title: Hungry Pandas
body: At the start of the enviornment turn, if no bamboo cards are in play Hungry Pandas deal {H} hero targets 1 point of gnawing damage.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy a bamboo card.
cards.flavorText: It turns out that pandas aren't really picky eaters after all.

cards.title: Bamboo
cards.body: When this card enters play, destroy all plastic cards

cards.title: Plastic Utensils
cards.body: At the beginning of the envionrment turn, Plastic Utensils deals 1 pyschic damage to all environment targets.

cards.title: Nordic Teen
body: When a nature target would take damage, reduce that damage by 1 and direct it to Nordic Teen.
At the end of the envionrment turn, Nordic Teen recovers 1 HP.

cards.title: Conglomerate
body: When this card enters play, destroy a nature card.
At the end of the envionrment turn, Conglomerate deals each environment target 1 toxic damage.
cards.flavorText: Yeah, but what about our profits?

cards.title: National Government
cards.body: This card is immune to the effects of all other environment cards
cards.flavorText: I don't know, that seems really difficult.  Someone else figure it out.

cards.title: Dolphins
body: When a fish card enters play, place it under dolphins.
When three fish cards are under dolphins, remove dolphins and the cards beneath it from the game

cards.title: Fish
cards.body: When this card enters play, if no dolphin card is in play deal 1 hero target {H*1} bludgeoning damage and place this card at the bottom of the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: Nothing quite as warm as a slap from a trout.
